titleStmt.title: Mr. Lilly's new prophecy, or, Several strange and wonderful predictions of such things that have and are yet to happen, as well in England, Scotland, and France as in remote countrys being left as his last legacy to the world, the like not having been published before.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
